contentrichtext.text: {{wiktionary|.ch}} '''CH''', '''Ch''', '''cH''', or '''ch''' may refer to: ==Business== * [[Bemidji Airlines]] IATA code * [[Carolina Herrera (fashion designer)|Carolina Herrera]], a fashion designer based in New York. ==Entertainment and sports== * [[Television channel|Channel]] (sometimes abbreviated as "ch." for television and cable stations) * [[CollegeHumor|College Humor.com]], a comedy website * [[Cutie Honey]], an anime series in Japan * [[Cypress Hill]], musical band * [[E! (Canadian TV system)|E!]], a defunct Canadian [[television system]] that went by the CH name from 2001 to 2007 * The logo for the [[Montreal Canadiens]] ice hockey team, derived from its French name, ''Les Canadiens de Montréal'' * [[Children's Hospital (web series)|Children's Hospital]], a [[Warner Bros.|WB.com]] web series turned [[Adult Swim]] television show ==Languages== * [[Chamorro language]]: ISO 639 alpha-2 language code (ch) * [[Ch (digraph)]], considered a single letter in several Latin-alphabet languages ==Mathematics and programming== * [[Chomsky hierarchy]], in computer science, a containment hierarchy of classes of formal grammars * [[Continuum hypothesis]], in set theory * [[Hyperbolic cosine]], in mathematics, a hyperbolic function, ch(x) = cosh(x) * [[Curry–Howard correspondence]], the relationship between computer programs and mathematical proofs * [[CH register]], the high byte of an X86 16-bit CX register * [[Ch (computer programming)|Ch]], a cross-platform C/C++ interpreter ==Education== * [[Christ's Hospital]], Horsham, West Sussex. ==Medicine== * [[Cluster headache]] * [[Congenital hypothyroidism]] ==Military== * [[Cargo helicopter]] (U.S. military helicopter alpha-numeric prefix) * [[Columbia Helicopters]] * [[Chain Home]]: A WW2 Radar array * [[Heavy cruiser]] (U.S. Navy ship code CH, standing for "Cruiser, Heavy") ==Places== * [[CH postcode area]]; the Chester postcode area in the UK * [[Switzerland|Confoederatio Helvetica]], the formal name for Switzerland, Latin in origin. * [[Chihuahua (state)]], the State of Chihuahua, Mexico * [[Conservation Halton]], in Ontario, Canada * [[People's Republic of China]] (FIPS and NATO country code CH) * [[ISO 3166-1 alpha-2|ISO country code]] for Switzerland ** [[.ch]], the Internet country code top-level domain for Switzerland ==Science== * The [[methylidyne radical]] '''⫶'''CH * The [[methylidyne group]] ≡CH * The [[methanetriyl group]] >CH− * The [[methine group]] (methanylylidene, methylylidene) =CH− * [[Cholesterol]] * [[Metres above the Sea (Switzerland)]], an elevation reference system ==Others== * [[Chain (length)]]: a unit of linear measure in the Imperial system. * [[Championship (dog)|Ch.]], a prefix for the registered name of a dog qualifying for a championship at a conformation show * [[Clay]] of high plasticity (USCS soil type CH) * [[Companion of Honour]], a British and Commonwealth honour * [[Chaudhary]], an honorific used in the Indian and Pakistani Punjab regions * "Club Herbert", something related to [[Club Penguin]] {{disambiguation}}
